title: Can we bring back the first featured game mode released? (One for All Summoners Rift)
body:
It was by far the best game mode in my opinion next to urf, and the new champions released since it's released would be so much so much fun to play on it! Imaginee a Kalista, Ulting a Kalista, Ulting a Kalista, Ulting a Kalista, Ulting a Kalista, Or a Tahm >>>> (Same Pattern as Kalista)

I loved the game mode, was just so fun! Loved trolling people with Ziggs W, ;-; Knocking them into enemy team lol

replies.body:
But... what happens when two kalista's ult each other simultaneously???

O.O THEY TRANSCEND THE MORTAL REALM! *GASP*

No way, that mode was 200x better on the Howling Abyss where everyone played it even during that original release.  Plus the later released Mirror Mode was the best balanced game LoL has ever had ever.
I don't see why featured game modes have to be balanced? They're fun and goofy nobody really cares whether you win or lose most times. Just like in Arams Lol.

Using Urf as an example, I really hated the OP super breakon champions. I really loved it when Riot disabled all the super broken champions like Hecarim and Ryze. Those champions were just in every game and it got stale because they just dominated so hard. Regardless or whose team they were on, the game just got more boring because they were in it.
Umm Its kinda on PBE Right now its Summoners Rift only though
Ik, I made this post before the files were even added to the PBE.
let's not pretend people don't treat aram like ranked time to time.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkSoul245,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=WTegMZq9,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-09-30T03:43:47.861+0000)
>
> I don't see why featured game modes have to be balanced? They're fun and goofy nobody really cares whether you win or lose most times. Just like in Arams Lol.

They don't.  I'm just saying with how unbalanced the game is normally, mirror mode turned out to be a TON of fun by actually forcing the balance into it for a change.  I had an 88% winrate during that mode.

Are you serious? I though that game was cancer, fun first minutes then just anoying as fk, the good thing about one for all in SR was how everyone builded diferent, and you saw some weird junglers or builds that actually somewhat worked

This was easily my favorite 'gimmick' gamemode. All the other ones you'd see everyone spamming the same few "op" champions and it got stale. With that game mode there was so much experimenting to do, the event just didn't give you enough time. Please Riot, All for one!
It was announced 2 days ago :), and is now on the PBE :D http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/10/102-pbe-update.html#more

I really feel like this could be amaizing with the champions you mentioned, i loved that game mode to, i think riot should give every player a ban in featured game modes, so they can be more balanced when you can ban someone because is annoying not only the op ones
My favorite part of this game mode was how it was released. Starting in customs as a glitch.

For the exact scenarios you describe I bet it would be difficult for Riot to implement. 

Since it's release they've done a lot more "unique" types of abilities that might problematic for such a mode. Just a guess though.

Can you imagine how many Rek'Sai tunnels would be on the map? Could anyone click on anyone's tunnel? Chaos ensues!

You can still do "Some" of it in game, If a Tahm eat's someone the Kalista can ult the tahm. While someones inside him. They thought it was difficult with syndra, but they later then fixed it quite easily. Just let everyone control every syndra ball around them lol.

And thats the point :P, chaos random shit happens, not suppose to be balanced lol
